entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 30 in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
